project.name: C-C170B-GIMP-08-ST04-DT06-DF04-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C170B-GIMP-08-ST04-DT06-DF04-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Good inputs: 1) environment variable is not set. 2) environment variable is set to a filename that exists and whose contents contain a null character in first 16 bytes.3) environment variable is set to a filename that does not exist.Bad input: 1) environment variable is set to a file that does not contain a null character in first 16 bytes.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 8690 -s 50 -m "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/good01.txt" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
